language.entry: The Shieldbreaker DLC allows the Shieldbreaker hero class to be recruited in your Estate. Also contains several new monsters.
A Mysterious scale from the distant wastes. Fierce protection.
A sandstorm of rumours and half-truths swirl around the newcomer.
Graceful and deadly, these elegant executioners are welcome additions to the standing army.

A sandstorm of grace and fury, the Shieldbreaker dances through the ranks delivering precision strikes of remarkable power. Sundering armor, breaking enemy formations, and leaving the taste of venom wherever she goes, the Shieldbreaker is a remorseless combatant.

The Shieldbreaker wields a spear and buckler, affording her impressive offensive reach and a modicum of protection. Her dancer's garb is better suited to the stage than the dungeon; she must be quick on her feet to survive.

Though quiet and demure while the fire blazes, the Shieldbreaker is haunted by nightmares of her past. These visions are so powerful that she must vanquish them in the dreamscape or awaken sluggish, tired, and stressed.
I am a beautiful thing, they say. Flawless as the sea of dunes. Graceful as the desert wind. Captivating as a shimmering mirage. They stare, they linger, they watch me without blinking.

Such exquisiteness must be admired, they say. And so I am made to dance for their desperate, dust-pitted faces; for their watery, bloodshot eyes; their cracked, grinning lips. I am not a person to this debauched audience, I am an exotic wonder. I am a beautiful thing.

Such loveliness belongs in the palace, they say. And so my hands are tied, and I am put in a caravan next to golden idols and jeweled icons. Together, we are a priceless cargo of dazzling rarities, bound for the Vizier's treasury. I know this tyrant's reputation, and I am afraid.

As the wagon careens along the mountain road, I make my choice. I will not go to the Vizier. I will not be this man’s prize; his plaything. With practiced grace, I slip my bonds, and lunge for the open air. The wagon teeters and the guard shouts. Wheels lift, horses panic...

I am lodged in a jumble of corpses and wreckage. My arm is pinned. The serpent appears silently from behind a rock, tongue tasting the air. The bite is quick; the venom slow. It runs cold in my veins, inching up my arm - forcing me to make a terrible choice.

The knife is dull, and I must work quickly. In my panic, I saw, hack, and gouge. My cries are met with the silent indifference of the dunes, the chill of the desert wind, the cold light of the moon. I am sacrificing my beauty for a chance to live; paying for my future with the only currency I’ve ever had.

I stare at my severed hand, my bloodied arm. There will be no more leering crowds, no more coins thrown at my feet. I breathe a wordless thanks to my liberator, as it slithers away into the shadows. At last, I am free of my gilded cage. At last, I finally understand: a thing cannot be truly beautiful until it is broken.
Another nightmare. A fitting audience for my last dance.
T-the snakes! The snakes are everywhere!
The desert - it pulls me back!
I-it cant be - get back you filthy vipers!
I make myself strong, that I may do what is required.
Be as untouchable as the wind and sand.
The poison still lingers in my veins...
...am...am I still lying delirious in the desert?!
I will not be claimed by the Vizier!
N-no! I will not be delivered to the palace!
Keep the crowd away from the stage!
I should have never trusted your camaraderie!
Fah! I had a feeling a snake was among us!
Treachery! You are all his agents!
What is he paying you to kidnap me?!
You are as graceful as elephants! Quick as camels!
Your skills are as coarse as the cloth you wear!
You are the sand in my boot!
You would not last a day in the open desert!
As I cleaved my hand from my wrist I drowned in transcendent joy and freedom!
Never seek to escape pain, it is the root note of life's song!
Let them slake their bloodlust upon me!
Witness me and weep, for I am perfection.
Should not the ornament be ornamented?
You are as useless as my envenomed hand!
Keep me from harm, I will lead us to victory!
I will dance the story of my victories!
My steps stumble, my tongue trips, victory is theirs for certain.
My hope, spilled like water from a canteen...
Perhaps the adder's venom has sickened my mind...?
I thought this a mirage, but now know it is true!
Moon and sun, cooling and heating the sand together beyond the black pyramids.
All gods will someday die in the sands of time!
My legs are snakes, my eyes are spears!
Come and dance and sing with me! The feast will last until the next moon!
Hope swirls around me like the Sirocco!
Evade, beguile, but give no ground!
To be hopeless is to be fooled by one's self!
As long as we can strike one last blow, victory is certain!
The wind sings with our weapons!
Victory is just beyond the dune!
Tomorrow is for healing! Today, for glory!
We will dance as long as our hearts beat!
All dance begins with a single step, all songs with a single word.
Let the eye follow the spear tip and the heart will rise on its own.
Discipline and focus - these are the tools of a master!
When we dance as one, the sum is beyond its parts!
Let us move in terrible synchronicity!
Show these cretins to the door!
Power is not about strength, but about timing.
They hesitate and stumble! Rush them!
Let visions of victory and glory kindle your heart's fire!
I am the Sirocco, my fury renders all to dust and ashes!
Evil fears what it cannot contain!
My body and mind are one!
If you can count your wounds then you can stand and fight!
There is one more dance left in our bones!
Bring rhythm back into your steps!
Unsteady breath makes for unsteady movement!
I am the desert in all its fury!
Let us increase the tempo of our assault!
My heart pounds to forgotten rhythms!
One misstep and I will find myself in chains again!
My heart skips all over, sweat makes my weapon slick...
Perhaps if I offered myself to the palace they would not kill me.
Perhaps my escape was a perversion of destiny. Does Fate itself hunt me?!
I can feel the Vizier's hand upon my shoulder!
Are those eyes glaring at my back?
One of you is a royal agent, seeking to reclaim his property!
My escape came too easily! This is a trap!
How much is the bounty on my head you greedy sods?!
I seek the bloody edge of the dance, the twilight between control and ecstasy!
Silk is worn best soaked in blood!
Life blossoms upon realizing that pain can become pleasure!
I expect you oafs will trip and fall on your own blades!
I need more worthy dance partners!
The other slave dancers had more fight in them!
May the desert take you all!
No rhythm, no poise! I give up on you all!
You have the grace of a drunken mule!
I will accept 2 gold for each wound I inflict.
Shower me with your coins, your adulation!
Throw your roses upon my stage!
I still haven't decided if you are worthy of my company.
It will be my name upon the marquee!
I'm nothing more than a dancer, a slave. A wasted life.
I am just a slave pretending to be free.
I put vipers in your bedrolls! hahaha
I have seen across great vistas beyond time...beyond space...
The colour cast from the comet is indescribable!
The feast was delicious, my compliments to the Viscount!
We must fly! Peril draws near!
Vipers prefer to strike from behind!
Better I keep you all in my sight!
Is there no wall for my back?
A true dancer becomes one with the flame!
I am drawn to the fight like the moth to the lantern!
The fight is pointless if wounds frighten you!
I meant to move backward! hee hee
I did not move, you did!
What strange rugs that move on their own...
My dance is finished, I must retire.
Excuse me, I am looking for something...
I meant to move forward! hee hee
Remand me to the troupe once more.
I will draw their attention so you might survive.
It is not much of a sacrifice but perhaps enough for you to live.
I face death in the hopes that I will want to live.
My clumsy steps will no longer interfere.
I hoped I could be more useful, I was mistaken.
I shall be lashed for such a poor performance.
I will get us all killed.
Spare me your pity, a slave deserves none.
Your dance lacks rhythm, step aside!
I will take care of this, again!
Shine the light upon me, and marvel!
If I die, we all die!
A moment to regain my step.
Death holds no appeal at the moment.
You would do the same in my place!
Death has transfixed me in her pale gaze...
This place has me trapped in terror!
Fear is a riddle my mind cannot solve.
I see our skulls piled on some obscene altar.
Trust is a currency a slave spends carefully.
Only a fool sticks their hand in a viper's nest.
I will dance where I please.
That would put me off my rhythm.
I am conserving energy for when it will matter.
From here their weaknesses are the most apparent.
I grow tired of your false encouragement.
I have no steps left to dance.
It's a lost cause, like me.
Snakes still flow in my blood.
You would order me to my death!
My rhythm keeps me safe from you.
The Vizier's agents must be kept on their toes!
I am not about to start trusting you now!
I do this to stay free!
So far I have only lost a pittance of blood!
The fury of my dance must take me to the very edge!
Who knows? I may yet lose my other hand!
I do this because it irritates you.
You oafs are going to get me killed!
None of you are my betters!
Donkeys! Swine! Make way for something beautiful!
I thought I had explained my plan?
Rhythm can't be explained, only expressed.
May the cruel fates guide me where they will.
That will be perfect for my collection!
Oh my! The planets move so quickly!
When hens become roosters then kings will be pigs!
It is difficult to stay alight on a flaming wick!
Did anyone hear screaming just now?
I think we are missing someone.
A fire will only give us away.
Keep quiet - they are all around!
I'd feel safer if you were all dead.
I prefer a thicker thread for stitches.
Please rub salt in the wounds on my back.
Anyone up for a game of pinfinger?
How does one burn the stew every single time?
Does no one bathe in your culture?
There would be no need to camp if you had any skill in combat.
I needed the water for my boots.
My pack carries more weight than you lot.
I'm sure you can cover the watch shifts without me.
The flame's dance fails to lift my heart.
Not in the mood to chat right now.
I think I will retire early.
Stay out of my bedroll, worms!
I apologize but I do not know the language of the sea.
As your grandmother, I must insist you finish your food!
I hack, I gouge, I sunder!
The scroll holds every jest the universe has to offer!
Tell the Vizier I send my regards!
Fools only listen to the lessons from the lash!
I am the thunder that flees the lightning!
An errant camel! A tearful son!
Can you smell my blood now, fiends?
I didn't think it would be this easy.
I'm in the desert once more - the limb must come off!
This is something that came to me in a dream!
Safety is an illusion in this snake pit.
Cowardice is cause for a whipping!
I was just starting to feel like myself.
Why settle for a stream of blood? I demand a river!
The oasis can only be found in the burning wastes!
I forgot to bolt the gate!
And can you imagine frozen water fell from the sky?
My heart is being cowed into silence!
I must dance when I should run!
I will not be made a slave again!
This is preposterous! Where is my party?!
How dare you lay a hand on a royal dancer?!
Take my other hand if you dare!
To release birds in the morning light, a cage must be opened!
The stream meanders but screams as it wanders.
Terror grows with each blow avoided!
The Vizier's agents must be kept on their toes!
One of a thousand conspiracies that threaten me!
A pigment for the eyes and another for the lips.
Do you think I'd make a good mother?
I would have looked much better doing that.
I had already claimed that kill!
Well at least you hit it, I suppose.
Imprecise, off-balance, no rhythm. A wound nonetheless.
It is not noon yet, strike not the bell!
I told you no one can smite a spirit!
Oh gods! I will be next!
The scorpion and the snake work together it seems.
From one performer to another: try harder.
Just stirring the hornet's nest for us all....
I can't help you if you can't help yourself.
Once again, I will do all the work.
Are you sure you're holding it the right way?
I was once just a small grain of sand in a massive hourglass.
Birds fly inside out under water, over sea.
Ah the conspirators turn upon their own, as expected.
Like the lowly hyena, they attack their own kind.
It saddens me you do not appreciate the sweet song of the blade.
No drum stirs the feet like the rhythm of spurting blood!
Jackals devour the straggling camel first.
Excuse me, I am trying to peruse your wares!
As you wish m'lord. Another dance, then.
It might have missed you but will certainly hit me!
No fiend makes the same mistake twice!
The dunes are an ocean - we are underwater!
I have broken a hundred hearts, and I feel nothing.
Some sands were not meant to be trodden!
I will not dance to your sinister tune!
I am right where they want me to be!
Your song is well out of tune!
I lead the dance, not you!
A djinn cannot lie twice. But it can lie three times.
Sand is the ash fallen from the sun itself.
My chains have returned, but where is my hand?
Do you have anything that increases the agony?
I would prefer a proper stitching.
Better to pour your water out over the hot sands.
My top is stoppered, in case you hadn't noticed.
Speak up! I can't hear you!
With a poignard clasped behind you?
I know venom when I see it!
Lovely thought but I am more than fine!
If you find me unconscious then by all means..let me enjoy it.
Not yet, I don't want to feel alive.
Leave me, this is your final warning!
An alley with no entrance welcomes the batrachians.
The spheres burn the ether faster than anticipated.
A peasant's curse! How dare you!
Any advantage will end the fight too soon!
No harm in a few more cuts.
I am already too strong, the gods will soon take notice.
That is not horse food. I am a horse.
Is existence subject to time and space?
Your weakness shines like a lantern in the night!
A snake's neck is always exposed!
Dancing and fighting - there is no difference.
No defense can handle attacks from all directions!
Slow your hearts, we are safe here.
A welcome pause from a frantic dance.
Let the fire's roar soothe our nerves.
I have practice tending to the other dancers.
Just listen to my song and the pain will be lessened.
I have just the tea for you.
Come now, we have made it this far…
Rest easy and you will awaken refreshed.
The light always banishes the shadow.
In through the nose, out through the mouth.
What do you call your constellations here?
Don't sneak up on me like that!
But if you are mistaken, I could die!
No, I have heard the rumours!
Anything to finally be rid of me, eh?
Have to keep a low profile.
As a slave, I learned to distinguish who is ill-disposed.
Maybe come back with a hot brand!
I want things to get worse...hehe.
Among these creatures, I am truly a diamond in the rough.
Competence is the rarest treasure, it would seem.
Let me be, I've done enough.
Giving up. Giving in. It's all the same.
I sailed upon a sea of dunes, under a moon of cheese!
No water in the well- down, down, down to hell!
Pass the salt - I need it for my wounds!
Experience pain to the fullest! You only live once!
The rhythm of suffering is sublime!
Soil me not with your filthy ministrations.
Waste of resources, if you ask me.
Keep your hands to yourself, cretin.
We are undone. This is the end.
I would let the fire die and weep in the dark.
Take it away - I don't know where that's been!
It's poisoned. Dump it out on the ground.
I have bled once for my freedom - I will do so again!
My performance was unworthy. Let me starve.
I eat only what the guard gives me.
And choke on the sand once more?! I think not!
Damage Block tokens, also known as "Aegis tokens", absorb 100% of the physical damage from the next attack that strikes the hero.

Aegis Scales are dropped by snakes who come from the Shieldbreaker's homelands. These scales can be consumed by heroes to provide a single damage block of protection. The next attack that hits the hero will do zero damage!
There will be no rest by the fire tonight...
As the firelight fades, ghastly memories gather their strength.
Sand and serpent choke out hope of wholesome reverie!
Trauma and torment return for an encore performance!
Horrifying memory, brought back into the spotlight by a tortured mind.
Moans and cries, lost in the darkness.
The viper seeks to claim its quarry at last!
Shifting, swaying - she mesmerizes her prey before the fatal strike!
She has paid dearly for her freedom, and deserves better than this place...
They arrive with the East wind - a torrent of whirling doom!

The Shieldbreaker is scarred from past trauma. She must navigate a series of seven flashback battles while camping. (One battle per camp.) Once those battles are completed, she can camp peacefully forever.
NOTE: The seven flashbacks are shared across the whole Shieldbreaker class. You don't have to do seven battles for each Shieldbreaker recruit.
Now that the Shieldbreaker has relived her past through her troubled dreams, she sleeps peacefully. As a result, she gains some buffs each time she camps!
This night holds no comfort for me.
I sleep the sleep of an unburdened queen!
No snake will ever trouble my dreams again!

The Flagellant relishes the scars and abrasions that cover his body - drawing incomprehensible resilience from the tearing of his own flesh. His flail, a particularly cruel and merciless weapon, drips with his enemies' blood...and his own.

Eschewing the company of others, the Flagellant turns his back to the fire, denying himself the comfort of its warmth. Instead, he whips himself mercilessly - this a man locked in perpetual battle with his own flesh and blood.

The Flagellant belongs to an extremist faction within the church, and is generally regarded with a toxic mixture of fear, awe, and disgust. The power he draws from martyrdom is as effective as it is unsettling - in one moment he is a fountain of healing renewal, and the next, a conduit of terrible wrath. His full potential is realized only the brink of madness...or death.
Immune to death by Crimson Curse
Something stirs within my body - what is this?!
I feel as if I've swallowed a handful of pins.
I feel a sharp burning inside.
My innards boil with venom and wriggling vermin!
I am pierced from inside by vermin's mandibles!
Something lives inside and I can feel it burrowing!
The burden is infinite. All flesh must perish.
As the burden grows, so too, does my purity.
I am blessed with new clarity!
Gladly do I accept this new trial! Blessed are the worthy!
Through pain and agony, I drag myself to the Light!
Blood washes my eyes and cleanses my vision!
In this fragile, broken flesh infinite strength is revealed!
What I once feared, I have become!
Adversity has dissolved my mortal psyche and opened my skull to the Light!
What is fear but a key to piety?
Through pain, through agony - I drag myself to the Light!
Blood washes my eyes and cleanses my vision, for the Light I suffer!
It falls to me to guide you back to the Light.
Resist not the burden for it will guide you better than any compass.
I do not attack you. It is the light that seeks to purify you.
Don't you see? The pain eases the burden.
I envy the free flow of your blood.
The burden must be borne by all!
Purity guides my every act, shrink not from my blows!
Clear this mind. Clear this mind. Clear this mind.
The light must burn brighter if we are to persist!
Begone foul visions, flee before my flowing blood!
I am set upon by tempting visions! Light guide me!
I hesitated upon the path. Let the blood soothe my faith!
First the sacred wound, then the purifying salt, then the holy stitch.
Pain cleaves away the basest instincts!
Suffering is the vessel into which I pour my blood!
Wounds…not a setback…beacons for the Light.
Sense the Light… behind all fates.
The Light shrinks from my inner vision and so follows my faith.
So grows the burden! So grows my strength!
Behold - the Light shines from my wounds!
I see you all as profane corpses. A righteous fate for those who fear pain.
Must the burden weigh on my mind as well as my body?
I no longer need to be tested! See how I shine!
Weaklings! Wear your wounds with honor!
This one greets pain with arms wide open!
I am the sun of salvation!
I can show you the points where the pain sings most sweetly!
To heal a wound is to fail the lesson.
…and this holy man flayed himself with a single prolonged cut and so he ascended…
Pain is the Light's song, and agony is its blessing.
Has anyone seen my prayer caltrops?
Who will sponge me with vinegar?
I grieve when wounds clot and close, but rejoice at their re-opening.
I trust my screams will not disturb your slumber.
True strength is drawn from the burden.
I am one with the weight, its strength flows through me.
I cannot lean on another or I will lose the way!
Hunger is but another step on the path.
To satiate desire is to bow to the beast inside.
It is time to bleed, not time to eat.
Gluttony darkens the Light and muddies the way.
If you cannot see the Light then gouge your eyes!
Worthless! Anyone can see you have shirked your burden.
The way requires the flow of blood.
Why lighten the burden? Why deprive the soul?
How dare you try to silence my choir of wounds?!
Make yourself useful and pass me the salt.
The flesh is mortal, embrace this and live forever.
We must not stray from the path.
Into rivers of blood this broken flesh must drown.
We have feared thus the Light flickers and wanes.
Do not pull me from this holy path!
To flee is to abandon all faith!
I cannot waver, this flesh will be delivered!
Without blood there is no true salvation.
This burden cannot be set aside.
I must bear the burden - the weight of my sin.
I will not flee these blows!
This is a trial of faith!
Strength flows to those who stand with faith!
Aside cur! I must follow my path!
I will shoulder your burden too, impious one.
This is the way, will you stop me?
I know it makes no sense to you, ye who bears such little weight.
It is here I seek the answers through pain.
The burden only seeks to increase itself and I strive to ensure this happens.
Fall behind me and test your flesh! Salvation can yet still find you.
Sheep to the back! I am the shepherd!
Into the fire! I must purify myself in the crucible of faith!
See me Light! Witness how I shrink not from the burden!
"Through holy agony, bear thy impure flesh forward into the rending knives of the heretics!"
"The way is found where the weapon cleaveth the flesh and lo it is worthy! Blood be thine true sign!"
Anyone with true humility would advance with me!
Travels along the way… blood will flow…
Where the way leads… pain… certain…
Agony… pain… holy trials… each step…
Where faith goes, the blood must follow!
Each wound is a prayer heard!
I wait, ready for the burden!
Another test. I will not waiver.
Have I strayed? Light guide me!
Guided by pain! Favoured by the Light!
Flee from the holy bearer, you impious fiends!
Blood for the burden! Bones for the Light!
You disturb the litanies of the blood.
"There will be those who tempteth the flesh into releasing the burden."
You have hallowed your soul unto the darkness.
We each have our own burden to bear, unto Death and the valley beyond.
I stand where the Light shines pure!
I've waited long for this! DON'T TAKE IT FROM ME.
Whose will is so pure as to presume command?
The corrupt flesh rots the mind. Light guide me then!
I have studied my scars and divined the way, have you?
All wounds lead to the Light!
Reason is too weak to bear any burden! Release it!
Warning! Current contagion level in this facility:
"They're everywhere! Crush the invading insects to earn Invitations to the Courtyard!"
Curse-carrying insects have begun to spread over the Estate!
"All is quiet. The swarms have receded to the swampy ruins of the Courtyard."
Leave enough Blood for them, or they may die!
I am the fury! I will drink from my enemies!
The Blood! I must have the Blood!
Get infected by the Crimson Curse
Lose a hero to Wasting Away from the Curse
Kill an ally (via attack_friendly act out) while under the Curse
Contract the Crimson Curse via contagion
Have your entire roster affected by the crimson curse
ALL MUST BLEED! IT IS THE WAY!
GIVE IT TO ME, I KNOW YOU HAVE IT!
You are keeping The Blood for yourself, aren't you!
Do not deny me what I need to survive!
I asked nicely before, I just really need some Blood.
Please just a small taste! Do not make me drain your veins dry!
I made every reasonable offer possible, and look at what you just made me do.
Interest gained on saved gold: %d%% per week.
I have been chosen to suffer, so suffer I must!
Let all foulness be purged from my sacred flesh!
I find comfort in the pain...
AWASH IN CRIMSON! I AM REBORN!
AM I HUMAN OR MERELY A VESSEL FOR THE BLOOD?!
MY LIFE FOR THE CRIMSON FLUID!
The craving itself speaks through me.
I know not what I've become but I know what I need!
I shall surely perish of this thirst!
Gods have mercy! I am practically hollow!
It feels as though sand pushes through my veins...
DO NOT TAINT THE PURITY OF THE STRENGTH THE BLOOD GIVES ME!
As if encouragement and magics will help! Only The Blood!
True strength can only come from the Blood!
Those benefits are ephemeral and will eventually betray me!
But will it soothe my thirst?
I will be dead of thirst soon anyway.
Nothing could overcome this thirst I feel.
Disgusting! Have you any of The Blood, though?
It simply won't fill me up like the Blood does.
What dross, how dull everything tastes once one has sampled the exquisite Blood!
Is it Blood..? Oh nevermind then.
Would you mind if I just nicked your wrist instead? Oh well then...
WE MUST FLOOD THIS PLACE WITH BLOOD!
HA! I NEED NOTHING! THE BLOOD COURSES THROUGH ME!
WHAT FOR?! I AM FULL TO THE BRIM OF CRIMSON NECTAR!
I ALREADY SURGE WITH THE BLOOD'S VITALITY!
The only thing that will restore me is The Blood!
All that supports me now is the Blood!
I would rather thirst forever than accept any inferior nourishment.
Useless. Give me only my red nectar...please.
Much appreciated, but come back when you have some Blood.
I have not the strength. Only an infinite thirst...
No, please, you go ahead. I must rest.
I am simply not interested, unless you think there is Blood to be had...
%d bottles of The Blood brewed each week.
Idle stress relief in town increased by %d per week.
HERE I WILL STRIKE FOR BLOOD!
I CAN SMELL WHERE BLOOD WILL BE SPILLED!
What is that sweet smell that sings to my very veins?
Stand aside! I must slake my thirst!
I WILL TASTE YOU AND NOTHING WILL STOP ME!
Mmmmmm the wondrous smell of a wound!
Oh gods! That odour! That aroma of freshly spilled Blood!
Please just a taste! You're already injured!
I must see if there's any Blood hidden here!
Blood?! Could there be some here?
It must have The Blood hidden within. I pray...
Please let there be Blood, even the tiniest drop.
Forgive me but I must make absolutely sure there's no Blood.
Oh! I was not myself for a moment...
So hungry... I didn't even notice...
I fear my thirst has made my footing unstable.
I am just so tired, please end it now!
It is hopeless, I will never drink Blood again.
Have other heroes braved these swamps and marshes before you?
The mists can lead you to unexpected, dangerous places.
A well-timed dose of The Blood goes a long way.
Fire is an effective tool against insects.
Eating bananas is a surefire way to get swarmed by mosquitos.
You might find new uses for torches in Courtyard raids.
Sometimes a nip of laudanum is enough to keep the Horror at bay.
The Crimson Curse does offer certain advantages to savvy adventurers.
Defeat the Statue guardian to claim powerful trinkets.
The Courtyard is now unlocked for further adventures.
Thorns hook into the flesh, a cloying sap seeps into your wound!
These blossoms bear the stench of pestilence and unfathomable nightmares!
The wilting gives off a noxious odour!
You find treasure in the disgusting blood and soil!
These ghoulish flowers have nothing to offer.
A map is nestled between the thorns!
The flowers surge with growth! But the blood invites no other occurence.
The cloth protects your delicate flesh!
Your blood is tainted with a strange infection!
You cut your finger on a mandible.
These bones offer no further clues or loot.
The hero's scars weep and open when bathed in the crimson fluid!
The purified liquid offers a surprising boon!
Treasure lies in the gore-filled basin!
Burning the blood stings the nostrils and turns the stomach.
Gestating creatures burst forth from the eggs!
Disgusting viscera... and not much else.
Sweet relief as the eggs turn to ash.
There is nothing but rot inside the seemingly fresh morsels!
There are valuables scattered about the repast.

A monument, with no purpose except proclamation of one's dedication.
It would seem his taste for triviality remains unabated, even now.
The jig is up. The game is done.
What games does the diminutive fool play at now?
The corpulant braggart could never eat his fill. Let him dine on sharpened steel tonight.
The glutton's taste for morbidity is made more pronounced by his mutation.
Let us hope he enjoyed his last meal, served cold as it was.
The Countess arrives! Anomalous in aspect, and bent on exacting terrible revenge from beyond the bounds of decency!
Where I failed, you have succeeded, and the world is better for it
Even my untethered imagination dares not conceive of what effect the years spent submerged in toxic sludge
may have had on her heteromorphic flesh.
Soaked and sinking, these stone terraces and sprawling gardens were the site of long forgotten revelry, and well-remembered regret.
The maddening whine of multitudinous wings abates. Let us hope that is the end of things.
A hideous mutation - unnatural and abhorrent!
The flames of the smouldering pyre dance in his eyes dance with murderous zeal!
You are not alone in this place. The Fanatic is on the prowl, and he smells your sickness.
The whimpering dog flees to his kennel!
The hamlet cannot stand for this thing that should not be - defeat it! Claim the prize it guards!
It crumbles for now, but I fear there may be no end to this blood-borne evil.
The very grounds themselves are animated by a deep-rooted evil, a cosmic hatred for all that thrive beyond its tainted grasp.
Just as I feared. Now loosed from their brackish prison, they will spread like locusts across our land.
A fresh irritation to some. A sanguine memory to me.
The Courtyard and gardens surrounding the Manor were once a point of pride for the diligent custodians I employed.
Great banquets and lavish social affairs were hosted here, under the stars. Despite the expectation of propriety normally ascribed to those in our position,
we mocked the stoic melancholy of the moss covered fountains and cherubic statues. Our salacious trysts half-hidden in the hedgerows;
our morality slipping ever deeper... into the mud.
They would arrive in teeming hordes, adorned in powdered wigs and pretension - seeking to slake their thirst on wine and indecency.
As intoxication invariably took hold, innocuous frivolities would escalate to ever more disturbing diversions.
Orchestrating the hideous affair was a hunchbacked fiend who seemed to delight in proportion to the suffering he caused. I could have stopped him, I suppose,
but I was a slave to my own appetites, and restraint would have rendered me a hypocrite.
The feasting and revelry would last for weeks at a time. Great stone tables were set with such an abundance of rare delicacies
that we would stuff ourselves until the exotic became mundane. When the lavish spread began to spoil,
a ravenous gourmand gleefully proposed that we sample from the fetid pile of composting refuse!
The notion was dismissed as decidedly unhealthy, but days later he was found cackling madly atop a heap of rancid comestibles, licking his fingers in delight.
Madness can take many forms, but none so contemptible as man's belief in a mythology of his own making.
A world view buttressed by dogmatic desperation invariably leads to single-minded fanaticism, and a need to do terrible things in the name of righteousness.
This man is an animal - rabid, destructive, and incapable of nuanced understanding. He must be put down.
These swarming fiends carry a pernicious plague. A sickness so virulent - so insidious - it is more a curse than a mere disease!
The rusted, moss covered gates of the Courtyard hang open, but the demoniacal pests
will spread no further than its blood-soaked boundaries. And so at last, the end of my beginning.
The virulent clouds from the Courtyard have abated. The airs of the Estate feel...narrowly agreeable once again.
"Awash in blood and delusion, they bear the burden of a thousand lifetimes."
An unfamiliar wind caresses the hills and slips through even the deepest of caverns...is that hope?

Unsettling in the extreme, several of the church's more zealous advocates have wandered into the Hamlet in search of a glorious death. We hope they find it quickly.
The light seems to be rallying against the evil energies that cloak the region, finding its way into the deepest recesses and providing a fleeting advantage to the active militia.
Waves of relief wash over the Hamlet as the good news spreads: The Countess is dead, and her Curse is now curable.
An excommunicated madman has responded to the growing infestation in kind. Fueled by conviction, he is merciless, and plies his trade with extreme prejudice.

There are some who believe that only a litany of blood and suffering can cleanse sickness in the land. Here is one who will do his part.
Intolerable! Clouds of mosquitos and other, less identifiable pests continue to descend upon the Hamlet with maddening persistence! Illness and irritation abound.
A crumbling stone entry to a forgotten labyrinthian garden has been uncovered! The discoverer, sadly, has perished from innumerable insect stings. Concern rises.
The haze of contagion has abated, due in no small part to the recent triumph over the age-old horror that had lurked for too long behind the long-sealed Courtyard gate.
The Hamlet has been restored to a livable level of degeneracy once more. The dispersal of this pestilence to the surrounding environs, however, seems inevitable...

This quest is Epic! You are not expected to finish Epic quests in one attempt. You may REGROUP (abandon) the quest at any time, and your progress is saved. When you obtain another Invitation, you may continue the quest from where you left off.

was burned to death at the stake.
was burned to death at the stake.
I could sense in her a mocking thirst.
I plotted to rid myself of this lurking threat
in a grand display of sadistic sport.
But, as the moment of murder drew nigh,
The gibbous moon revealed her inhuman desires
and I set to work pursuing degeneracy
as I revealed the unnatural terroir of the house vintage.
But my exhaltation was cut short
as the attending gentry turned upon themselves
in an orgy of indescribable frenzy.
A single drop of that forbidden tannin
gifted me with a dizzying glimpse
of the hibernating horror beneath my feet.
I understood the terrible truth of the world.
I stood reborn, molted by newfound knowledge.

come to drink the tainted blood

The Shieldbreaker DLC allows the Shieldbreaker hero class to be recruited in your Estate. Also contains several new monsters.
A Mysterious scale from the distant wastes. Fierce protection.
A sandstorm of rumours and half-truths swirl around the newcomer.
Graceful and deadly, these elegant executioners are welcome additions to the standing army.

A sandstorm of grace and fury, the Shieldbreaker dances through the ranks delivering precision strikes of remarkable power. Sundering armor, breaking enemy formations, and leaving the taste of venom wherever she goes, the Shieldbreaker is a remorseless combatant.

The Shieldbreaker wields a spear and buckler, affording her impressive offensive reach and a modicum of protection. Her dancer's garb is better suited to the stage than the dungeon; she must be quick on her feet to survive.

Though quiet and demure while the fire blazes, the Shieldbreaker is haunted by nightmares of her past. These visions are so powerful that she must vanquish them in the dreamscape or awaken sluggish, tired, and stressed.
I am a beautiful thing, they say. Flawless as the sea of dunes. Graceful as the desert wind. Captivating as a shimmering mirage. They stare, they linger, they watch me without blinking.

Such exquisiteness must be admired, they say. And so I am made to dance for their desperate, dust-pitted faces; for their watery, bloodshot eyes; their cracked, grinning lips. I am not a person to this debauched audience, I am an exotic wonder. I am a beautiful thing.

Such loveliness belongs in the palace, they say. And so my hands are tied, and I am put in a caravan next to golden idols and jeweled icons. Together, we are a priceless cargo of dazzling rarities, bound for the Vizier's treasury. I know this tyrant's reputation, and I am afraid.

As the wagon careens along the mountain road, I make my choice. I will not go to the Vizier. I will not be this man’s prize; his plaything. With practiced grace, I slip my bonds, and lunge for the open air. The wagon teeters and the guard shouts. Wheels lift, horses panic...

I am lodged in a jumble of corpses and wreckage. My arm is pinned. The serpent appears silently from behind a rock, tongue tasting the air. The bite is quick; the venom slow. It runs cold in my veins, inching up my arm - forcing me to make a terrible choice.

The knife is dull, and I must work quickly. In my panic, I saw, hack, and gouge. My cries are met with the silent indifference of the dunes, the chill of the desert wind, the cold light of the moon. I am sacrificing my beauty for a chance to live; paying for my future with the only currency I’ve ever had.

I stare at my severed hand, my bloodied arm. There will be no more leering crowds, no more coins thrown at my feet. I breathe a wordless thanks to my liberator, as it slithers away into the shadows. At last, I am free of my gilded cage. At last, I finally understand: a thing cannot be truly beautiful until it is broken.
Another nightmare. A fitting audience for my last dance.
T-the snakes! The snakes are everywhere!
The desert - it pulls me back!
I-it cant be - get back you filthy vipers!
I make myself strong, that I may do what is required.
Be as untouchable as the wind and sand.
The poison still lingers in my veins...
...am...am I still lying delirious in the desert?!
I will not be claimed by the Vizier!
N-no! I will not be delivered to the palace!
Keep the crowd away from the stage!
I should have never trusted your camaraderie!
Fah! I had a feeling a snake was among us!
Treachery! You are all his agents!
What is he paying you to kidnap me?!
You are as graceful as elephants! Quick as camels!
Your skills are as coarse as the cloth you wear!
You are the sand in my boot!
You would not last a day in the open desert!
As I cleaved my hand from my wrist I drowned in transcendent joy and freedom!
Never seek to escape pain, it is the root note of life's song!
Let them slake their bloodlust upon me!
Witness me and weep, for I am perfection.
Should not the ornament be ornamented?
You are as useless as my envenomed hand!
Keep me from harm, I will lead us to victory!
I will dance the story of my victories!
My steps stumble, my tongue trips, victory is theirs for certain.
My hope, spilled like water from a canteen...
Perhaps the adder's venom has sickened my mind...?
I thought this a mirage, but now know it is true!
Moon and sun, cooling and heating the sand together beyond the black pyramids.
All gods will someday die in the sands of time!
My legs are snakes, my eyes are spears!
Come and dance and sing with me! The feast will last until the next moon!
Hope swirls around me like the Sirocco!
Evade, beguile, but give no ground!
To be hopeless is to be fooled by one's self!
As long as we can strike one last blow, victory is certain!
The wind sings with our weapons!
Victory is just beyond the dune!
Tomorrow is for healing! Today, for glory!
We will dance as long as our hearts beat!
All dance begins with a single step, all songs with a single word.
Let the eye follow the spear tip and the heart will rise on its own.
Discipline and focus - these are the tools of a master!
When we dance as one, the sum is beyond its parts!
Let us move in terrible synchronicity!
Show these cretins to the door!
Power is not about strength, but about timing.
They hesitate and stumble! Rush them!
Let visions of victory and glory kindle your heart's fire!
I am the Sirocco, my fury renders all to dust and ashes!
Evil fears what it cannot contain!
My body and mind are one!
If you can count your wounds then you can stand and fight!
There is one more dance left in our bones!
Bring rhythm back into your steps!
Unsteady breath makes for unsteady movement!
I am the desert in all its fury!
Let us increase the tempo of our assault!
My heart pounds to forgotten rhythms!
One misstep and I will find myself in chains again!
My heart skips all over, sweat makes my weapon slick...
Perhaps if I offered myself to the palace they would not kill me.
Perhaps my escape was a perversion of destiny. Does Fate itself hunt me?!
I can feel the Vizier's hand upon my shoulder!
Are those eyes glaring at my back?
One of you is a royal agent, seeking to reclaim his property!
My escape came too easily! This is a trap!
How much is the bounty on my head you greedy sods?!
I seek the bloody edge of the dance, the twilight between control and ecstasy!
Silk is worn best soaked in blood!
Life blossoms upon realizing that pain can become pleasure!
I expect you oafs will trip and fall on your own blades!
I need more worthy dance partners!
The other slave dancers had more fight in them!
May the desert take you all!
No rhythm, no poise! I give up on you all!
You have the grace of a drunken mule!
I will accept 2 gold for each wound I inflict.
Shower me with your coins, your adulation!
Throw your roses upon my stage!
I still haven't decided if you are worthy of my company.
It will be my name upon the marquee!
I'm nothing more than a dancer, a slave. A wasted life.
I am just a slave pretending to be free.
I put vipers in your bedrolls! hahaha
I have seen across great vistas beyond time...beyond space...
The colour cast from the comet is indescribable!
The feast was delicious, my compliments to the Viscount!
We must fly! Peril draws near!
Vipers prefer to strike from behind!
Better I keep you all in my sight!
Is there no wall for my back?
A true dancer becomes one with the flame!
I am drawn to the fight like the moth to the lantern!
The fight is pointless if wounds frighten you!
I meant to move backward! hee hee
I did not move, you did!
What strange rugs that move on their own...
My dance is finished, I must retire.
Excuse me, I am looking for something...
I meant to move forward! hee hee
Remand me to the troupe once more.
I will draw their attention so you might survive.
It is not much of a sacrifice but perhaps enough for you to live.
I face death in the hopes that I will want to live.
My clumsy steps will no longer interfere.
I hoped I could be more useful, I was mistaken.
I shall be lashed for such a poor performance.
I will get us all killed.
Spare me your pity, a slave deserves none.
Your dance lacks rhythm, step aside!
I will take care of this, again!
Shine the light upon me, and marvel!
If I die, we all die!
A moment to regain my step.
Death holds no appeal at the moment.
You would do the same in my place!
Death has transfixed me in her pale gaze...
This place has me trapped in terror!
Fear is a riddle my mind cannot solve.
I see our skulls piled on some obscene altar.
Trust is a currency a slave spends carefully.
Only a fool sticks their hand in a viper's nest.
I will dance where I please.
That would put me off my rhythm.
I am conserving energy for when it will matter.
From here their weaknesses are the most apparent.
I grow tired of your false encouragement.
I have no steps left to dance.
It's a lost cause, like me.
Snakes still flow in my blood.
You would order me to my death!
My rhythm keeps me safe from you.
The Vizier's agents must be kept on their toes!
I am not about to start trusting you now!
I do this to stay free!
So far I have only lost a pittance of blood!
The fury of my dance must take me to the very edge!
Who knows? I may yet lose my other hand!
I do this because it irritates you.
You oafs are going to get me killed!
None of you are my betters!
Donkeys! Swine! Make way for something beautiful!
I thought I had explained my plan?
Rhythm can't be explained, only expressed.
May the cruel fates guide me where they will.
That will be perfect for my collection!
Oh my! The planets move so quickly!
When hens become roosters then kings will be pigs!
It is difficult to stay alight on a flaming wick!
Did anyone hear screaming just now?
I think we are missing someone.
A fire will only give us away.
Keep quiet - they are all around!
I'd feel safer if you were all dead.
I prefer a thicker thread for stitches.
Please rub salt in the wounds on my back.
Anyone up for a game of pinfinger?
How does one burn the stew every single time?
Does no one bathe in your culture?
There would be no need to camp if you had any skill in combat.
I needed the water for my boots.
My pack carries more weight than you lot.
I'm sure you can cover the watch shifts without me.
The flame's dance fails to lift my heart.
Not in the mood to chat right now.
I think I will retire early.
Stay out of my bedroll, worms!
I apologize but I do not know the language of the sea.
As your grandmother, I must insist you finish your food!
I hack, I gouge, I sunder!
The scroll holds every jest the universe has to offer!
Tell the Vizier I send my regards!
Fools only listen to the lessons from the lash!
I am the thunder that flees the lightning!
An errant camel! A tearful son!
Can you smell my blood now, fiends?
I didn't think it would be this easy.
I'm in the desert once more - the limb must come off!
This is something that came to me in a dream!
Safety is an illusion in this snake pit.
Cowardice is cause for a whipping!
I was just starting to feel like myself.
Why settle for a stream of blood? I demand a river!
The oasis can only be found in the burning wastes!
I forgot to bolt the gate!
And can you imagine frozen water fell from the sky?
My heart is being cowed into silence!
I must dance when I should run!
I will not be made a slave again!
This is preposterous! Where is my party?!
How dare you lay a hand on a royal dancer?!
Take my other hand if you dare!
To release birds in the morning light, a cage must be opened!
The stream meanders but screams as it wanders.
Terror grows with each blow avoided!
The Vizier's agents must be kept on their toes!
One of a thousand conspiracies that threaten me!
A pigment for the eyes and another for the lips.
Do you think I'd make a good mother?
I would have looked much better doing that.
I had already claimed that kill!
Well at least you hit it, I suppose.
Imprecise, off-balance, no rhythm. A wound nonetheless.
It is not noon yet, strike not the bell!
I told you no one can smite a spirit!
Oh gods! I will be next!
The scorpion and the snake work together it seems.
From one performer to another: try harder.
Just stirring the hornet's nest for us all....
I can't help you if you can't help yourself.
Once again, I will do all the work.
Are you sure you're holding it the right way?
I was once just a small grain of sand in a massive hourglass.
Birds fly inside out under water, over sea.
Ah the conspirators turn upon their own, as expected.
Like the lowly hyena, they attack their own kind.
It saddens me you do not appreciate the sweet song of the blade.
No drum stirs the feet like the rhythm of spurting blood!
Jackals devour the straggling camel first.
Excuse me, I am trying to peruse your wares!
As you wish m'lord. Another dance, then.
It might have missed you but will certainly hit me!
No fiend makes the same mistake twice!
The dunes are an ocean - we are underwater!
I have broken a hundred hearts, and I feel nothing.
Some sands were not meant to be trodden!
I will not dance to your sinister tune!
I am right where they want me to be!
Your song is well out of tune!
I lead the dance, not you!
A djinn cannot lie twice. But it can lie three times.
Sand is the ash fallen from the sun itself.
My chains have returned, but where is my hand?
Do you have anything that increases the agony?
I would prefer a proper stitching.
Better to pour your water out over the hot sands.
My top is stoppered, in case you hadn't noticed.
Speak up! I can't hear you!
With a poignard clasped behind you?
I know venom when I see it!
Lovely thought but I am more than fine!
If you find me unconscious then by all means..let me enjoy it.
Not yet, I don't want to feel alive.
Leave me, this is your final warning!
An alley with no entrance welcomes the batrachians.
The spheres burn the ether faster than anticipated.
A peasant's curse! How dare you!
Any advantage will end the fight too soon!
No harm in a few more cuts.
I am already too strong, the gods will soon take notice.
That is not horse food. I am a horse.
Is existence subject to time and space?
Your weakness shines like a lantern in the night!
A snake's neck is always exposed!
Dancing and fighting - there is no difference.
No defense can handle attacks from all directions!
Slow your hearts, we are safe here.
A welcome pause from a frantic dance.
Let the fire's roar soothe our nerves.
I have practice tending to the other dancers.
Just listen to my song and the pain will be lessened.
I have just the tea for you.
Come now, we have made it this far…
Rest easy and you will awaken refreshed.
The light always banishes the shadow.
In through the nose, out through the mouth.
What do you call your constellations here?
Don't sneak up on me like that!
But if you are mistaken, I could die!
No, I have heard the rumours!
Anything to finally be rid of me, eh?
Have to keep a low profile.
As a slave, I learned to distinguish who is ill-disposed.
Maybe come back with a hot brand!
I want things to get worse...hehe.
Among these creatures, I am truly a diamond in the rough.
Competence is the rarest treasure, it would seem.
Let me be, I've done enough.
Giving up. Giving in. It's all the same.
I sailed upon a sea of dunes, under a moon of cheese!
No water in the well- down, down, down to hell!
Pass the salt - I need it for my wounds!
Experience pain to the fullest! You only live once!
The rhythm of suffering is sublime!
Soil me not with your filthy ministrations.
Waste of resources, if you ask me.
Keep your hands to yourself, cretin.
We are undone. This is the end.
I would let the fire die and weep in the dark.
Take it away - I don't know where that's been!
It's poisoned. Dump it out on the ground.
I have bled once for my freedom - I will do so again!
My performance was unworthy. Let me starve.
I eat only what the guard gives me.
And choke on the sand once more?! I think not!
Damage Block tokens, also known as "Aegis tokens", absorb 100% of the physical damage from the next attack that strikes the hero.

Aegis Scales are dropped by snakes who come from the Shieldbreaker's homelands. These scales can be consumed by heroes to provide a single damage block of protection. The next attack that hits the hero will do zero damage!
There will be no rest by the fire tonight...
As the firelight fades, ghastly memories gather their strength.
Sand and serpent choke out hope of wholesome reverie!
Trauma and torment return for an encore performance!
Horrifying memory, brought back into the spotlight by a tortured mind.
Moans and cries, lost in the darkness.
The viper seeks to claim its quarry at last!
Shifting, swaying - she mesmerizes her prey before the fatal strike!
She has paid dearly for her freedom, and deserves better than this place...
They arrive with the East wind - a torrent of whirling doom!

The Shieldbreaker is scarred from past trauma. She must navigate a series of seven flashback battles while camping. (One battle per camp.) Once those battles are completed, she can camp peacefully forever.
NOTE: The seven flashbacks are shared across the whole Shieldbreaker class. You don't have to do seven battles for each Shieldbreaker recruit.
Now that the Shieldbreaker has relived her past through her troubled dreams, she sleeps peacefully. As a result, she gains some buffs each time she camps!
This night holds no comfort for me.
I sleep the sleep of an unburdened queen!
No snake will ever trouble my dreams again!

You have chosen this foe, do not disappoint!
Familiarity breeds contempt... and does not forgive failure.
The campaign can wait. For now, carnage calls.
The reveling throng demands its portion!
Well well well, it would appear the buffoon is flummoxed!
Indecision kills more swiftly than steel. Be more prepared.
The fool has no plan, no strategy!
Fight on - the mob rallies to the underdog!
In the end, we all die alone.
The maniacal cheering swells, victory is at hand!
You deny the rabble their sport, and fuel their frustration...
Their resolve is broken! You have won!
The rabble thrills to the spilling of blood!
You've bested the rabble - now for something tougher!
A new bracket of competition demands strength and guile in equal measure.
Beware your rising prestige...it is a siren's call to those who would be your undoing.
Only the fiercest of opponents are worthy of the evening's feature match!
Mop the blood and collect the teeth. Will you muster the mettle to return?
A new League, a new crop of craven adversaries.
Trinkets and trophies are yours to claim.
All will hear of your victories... for a time. All things have their season.
Your trophies mount and word travels. Let it not precede collapse.
A cacophony of bloodthirsty delight. Praise well-earned!
Violence and vanity, debased lovers locked in an eternal embrace.
A traveling bacchanal, a debauched contest of survival - the Butcher's Circus is all these things, and more.
Seek out your rivals and greet them - with an iron glove!
Do not be hasty in the assemblage of your contestants - victory and defeat can be decided here.
Claim your spoils - they are hard earned, and the previous owner will not miss them.
On this list, blood and courage are the only means to ascension.

Here you can design your {colour_start|notable}Banner{colour_end} using pieces you have earned.
You can look through the categories of {colour_start|notable}Banner Pieces{colour_end} using the {colour_start|notable}tabs on the right side of the screen{colour_end}.
Banner pieces can be earned in many places, including by completing caretaker goals and achievements in the single player campaign. You can {colour_start|notable}[Mouse Over]{colour_end} a locked banner piece to see how to earn it or {colour_start|notable}[CLICK] to preview it{colour_end}.
Changes to your banner are temporary until you {colour_start|notable}[CLICK]{colour_end} "Apply All".

Unlike in the single player campaign, {colour_start|notable}you choose the order{colour_end} in which your heroes act each round in The Ring.
On your turn, {colour_start|notable}[CLICK AND HOLD] on a hero to activate them{colour_end}. Once a hero is activated, you won’t be able to change your selection, so choose wisely!
You can {colour_start|notable}[CLICK]{colour_end} on a hero to inspect them before deciding which hero to activate. Heroes can be inspected even during your opponent’s turn, so use this to plan ahead!

In the ring, you have a {colour_start|notable}limited amount of time to act{colour_end}. This is represented by the torch at the top of the screen.
If you take too long to act, the torch will begin burning down rapidly. If it burns out, you will {colour_start|notable}pass your turn{colour_end} and lose an action!
This will happen in a real match, but for this tutorial the timer is paused.

You and your opponent will {colour_start|notable}take turns{colour_end} activating heroes.
Each hero may only act {colour_start|notable}once per round{colour_end}.
The mark to the right of a hero’s health bar indicates that a hero has {colour_start|notable}not yet acted{colour_end} this round.
A new round begins when {colour_start|notable}all heroes have acted{colour_end}.

You can go to The Circus to fight {colour_start|notable}multiplayer battles{colour_end}. It is completely independent from the Estate.
Your heroes and trinkets in The Circus are separate and will not impact your single player progress.
Progress you make in The Circus, including your rank, banner design, and any rewards you unlock, {colour_start|notable}will carry over to other campaigns{colour_end} as long as you are logged into the same Steam account.

In the Dueling Grounds you can challenge other players directly.
{colour_start|notable}[CLICK] on an envelope{colour_end} to send an invitation to a friend through Steam.
If they accept, you will be connected before you choose your heroes and trinkets.

Heroes in The Circus are separate from those in the single player campaign. They have {colour_start|notable}different skills and effects{colour_end} suited for the unique rules of The Ring, and they will not disappear from your roster if killed.
{colour_start|notable}[LEFT CLICK]{colour_end} on a hero for quick access their stats, skills, and trinkets.
{colour_start|notable}[RIGHT CLICK]{colour_end} on a hero to see more detailed stats and to view or change their appearance.
{colour_start|notable}[DRAG]{colour_end} heroes to the slots of the bottom of the screen to form your team and their default order.

While fighting in The Circus, you will earn {colour_start|notable}Prestige{colour_end}.
As your prestige grows, the Ringmaster will grant you the use of {colour_start|notable}additional trinkets{colour_end} and new {colour_start|notable}pieces for your banner{colour_end}.
Prestige is earned by finishing matches, killing your opponent’s heroes, and by keeping more heroes alive when you win a match. Winning a match earns more prestige than losing.

Victories in The Ring will increase your {colour_start|notable}Rank{colour_end}, which is used to match you with similarly skilled opponents.
Each ranked {colour_start|notable}League{colour_end} is divided into {colour_start|notable}three tiers{colour_end}. The skulls surrounding the league symbol represent the number of {colour_start|notable}steps needed to reach the next tier{colour_end}.
You will {colour_start|notable}gain steps with each victory{colour_end} and lose them with each defeat.
